PowerOfTemurin.title: The Power of Eclipse Temurin
PowerOfTemurin.description: OpenJDK Based: Eclipse Temurin offer high-performance, cross-platform, open source Java™ Runtimes binaries that are enterprise-ready and Java SE TCK certified and AQAvit verified for general use in the Java Ecosystem.

TemurinFeatures.title: Prebuilt OpenJDK Binaries for Free!
TemurinFeatures.description: Java™ is the world's leading programming language and platform. The Adoptium Working Group promotes and supports high-quality, TCK certified runtimes and associated technology for use across the Java ecosystem. Eclipse Temurin is the name of the OpenJDK distribution from Adoptium.

secure-supply-chain.title: Secure Supply Chain
secure-supply-chain.description: Built with robust security standards, ensuring a trusted, transparent, and vulnerability-free supply chain.

tck-certified.title: TCK Certified
tck-certified.description: Thoroughly tested using AQAvit to guarantee performance, reliability, and security in every build.

performance-optimization.title: Performance Optimization
performance-optimization.description: Engineered for optimal performance, delivering speed, efficiency, and stability across diverse environments.

cross-platform.title: Cross-Platform Consistency
cross-platform.description: Consistent behavior and builds across all major operating systems and hardware architectures.

community-driven.title: Community Driven Development
community-driven.description: Eclipse Adoptium projects are shaped by a vibrant, global community that is continuously improving and innovating.

enterprise-ready.title: Enterprise Ready Support
enterprise-ready.description: Backed by enterprise-grade commercial supporters, ensuring seamless integration, scalability, and long-term sustainability.
